sense.gloss: variant (in a manuscript or book), part of a text that differs from other versions

sdata.j: |↑異↑↓い↓↑文|化↑↓ぶんか↓↑間↑↓かん↓のコミュニケーションはとてもむずかしいです。
sdata.e: It's very difficult to communicate with people from other cultures.

sdata.j: |↑異↑↓い↓↑文|化↑↓ぶんか↓の↑生活↑↓せいかつ↓に↑適応↑↓てきおう↓するのは↑一般↑↓いっぱん↓に↑難↑↓むずか↓しい。
sdata.e: It is generally hard to adapt to living in a foreign culture.

sdata.j: |↑異↑↓い↓↑文|化↑↓ぶんか↓↑交流↑↓こうりゅう↓は↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓います。
sdata.e: I think that cultural exchanges are important.
